summary: I OWN A 1998 HONDA ACCORD WITH 44,000 MILES.  I PURCHASED THE CAR NEW IN 1998.  I AM NOW HAVING SERIOUS TRANSMISSION PROBLEMS WITH THE CAR - LURCHING AND BUMPING.   WHEN I PRESENTED THE PROBLEM TO HONDA, THEY SAID THAT I MUST PAY FOR A NEW TRANSMISSION BECAUSE THE CAR IS OUT OF WARRANTY.  CAN HONDA GET AWAY WITH THIS?  I CAN'T BELIEVE THIS IS THE HONDA CAR COMPANY.  I PURCHASED THE CAR BECAUSE OF HONDA'S TRACK-RECORD OF RELIABILITY.
